|brand = Atmel |model = SAMA5D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 Xplained Ultra |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 4 March 2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Atmel_SAMA5D2_Xplained_Ultra |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = A08-2388/2 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atmel;ATSAM5D27; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A5 |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F4G08ABAE; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ8081; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, Arduino expansion |addchip = Advanced PMU,Active-Semi;ACT8865;;1;,,, I2C 2Kbit Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24MAC4602;;1;,,, 32-bit AVR microcontroller;Atmel;AT32UC3A4256;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;Lattice Semiconductor;Sil9022A;;1;,,, Non-Inverting 3-State Buffer;On Semi;NL17SZ126;;2;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Sipex;SP2526A;;1;,,, Overvoltage Protection Controller;ON Semi;NCP349;;1;,,, Low Capacitance Double ESD Protection Diode;NXP;PRTR5V0U2X;;1;,,, 150mA Ultra Low Supply Current LDO Regulator;On Semi;NCP4682;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2015 |estprice = 79 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' ATSAMA5D27 :@528MHz (ARM Cortex-A5) *Memory: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: TFT LCD *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Host, 1x Micro USB Device *Power Source: 5V 2A via microUSB
==Links of Interest== :[https://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/Atmel-44028-32-bit-Cortex-A5-Microprocessor-SAMA5D2-Xplained-Ultra_User-Guide.pdf User Guide]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/01/19/atmel-sama5d4-xplained-ultra-development-board-adds-hdmi-720p-video-decoding/ ''Atmel SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/atmel-launches-ultra-efficient-linux-ready-cortex-a5-soc/ ''Atmel launches ultra efficient, Linux ready Cortex-A5 SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.linux4sam.org/bin/view/Linux4SAM/Sama5d2XplainedMainPage ''SAMA5D2 Xplained Board'' on '''Linux & Open Source for AT91 Microchip Microprocessors''']
